tool.summary: This tool is intended for data exploration only. You should use this tool when trying to answer questions such as: “How much of the data for species X is identified to infraspecies?” or “How is the data for various infraspecies of species X distributed in space?”. This tool creates separate group layers for a) the parent species and b) all its infraspecies (if they exist).
